This is great news for Tesla. As the EV market becomes real with real competition, what they are doing is validated. GM is notorious for producing cars that produce good bullet points, but drive poorly and break down early (or has something changed recently?), a nice competitor to have. The Volt and Bolt are really ugly, and I can't figure out what I'm supposed to do once I'm out of power away from home.

Strict time schedules? Um...I believe those time schedules can be adjusted and make allowance for ships to not hit and kill a whale or two or a hundred. Maybe hire whale spotters during the migration months, or all year round, to spot and track whales and communicate with the incoming and outgoing ships the long and lat coordinates of the whales. Just an out there what if thought. The lack of decency and common sense of some individuals is appalling. Adjusting time schedules...Not rocket science. All creatures great and small have the right to life. Holy Moby Dick Batman!
